name: Hexanome
description: Hexanome is a turn-based puzzle game. After breaking triangle's solution on Hexa Turn, its time to empathize with the triangle. Collect all squares while AI tries to block your way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 1.4Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
